thread.title: There Was Nothing Hidden About Pharrell’s Side-Eye When Jenna Bush Confused Hidden Figures and Fences
thread.title_full: There Was Nothing Hidden About Pharrell’s Side-Eye When Jenna Bush Confused Hidden Figures and Fences

author: Dee Lockett
title: There Was Nothing Hidden About Pharrell’s Side-Eye When Jenna Bush Confused Hidden Figures and Fences
text: Not all black-centered films set during the civil rights era are created equal, but it appears Jenna Bush Hager missed the memo. While interviewing Hollywood’s elite on the Golden Globes red carpet, she hit a snag when Pharrell, producer and music consultant on Hidden Figures , stepped up to her mic.... More »
